instructions:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Mix tomatoes, cheese, onions and dressing.
Spoon 2 tsp. of the tomato mixture onto each cracker; sprinkle with cheese. Place on baking sheet.
Bake 8 to 10 min. or until cheese is melted. Serve warm.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons DI GIORNO Shredded Parmesan Cheese
title: RITZ® Bruschetta
